title: How to take information from another website and use it on my own - Quora

response.answer_text: It simple, you can see and implement some things on your website like: see the structure of their website.see what are the topic that they are using to write blogs.visit their different webpages to optimize your pages like them.see what mistakes they have made and avoid them on your website.Take inspiration from their images, content, categories, etc.

Use or create automated tools that retrieve information you need. There are various scripting languages if you're retrieving data from a website or even networked sources (intranet too), these can work for you. Introduction to Scripting Languages - GeeksforGeeks
